--- layout: api # ----- API DOCUMENTATION ----- title: List Templates method: GET path: templates sample: false # do not add response envelope fields, they're automatically included response: - [count, int, "The number of templates attached to the account."] - [ templates, collection, [ [templateKey, guid, "The template's unique-id."], [modificationTime, datetime, "Last modified timestamp."], [size, int, "Size of the template in bytes."] ] ] status: fields: [statusCode, statusMessage] values: - [200, "Ok"] - [401, "Unauthorized; missing or invalid API key."] # ----------------------------- ---

Fetches a list of all templates in the account. Can be used to find the key for a template you want to download.
